Title: Montblanc TimeWalker Chronograph Automatic- 116098
Description: Montblanc TimeWalker Chronograph Automatic- 116098 Order handling time: 2 working days Color: Black Dimensions: 43 mm Material: Stainless Steel Type: Watch Movement: Automatic Chronograph Bezel: Ceramic Case Material: Stainless Steel Dial Color: Black Glass: Sapphyre Water Resistant: 10 Bar (100 meters) Closure: Triple Deployant Strap Color: Black Strap Material: Leather This timepiece enhances the dynamic performance with a marked alternation of black and white-silver and is inspired by the racing car's on-board equipment. The MB 25.07 caliber includes chronograph complications and small seconds at 9 o'clock. In the chronograph center seconds and in the 30-minute and 12-hour counters, vertically aligned at 6 o'clock, white-silver scales are enhanced by a small Super-LumiNova® lining and 15-minute red markings to ensure maximum readability on the black dial both day and night. The legendary red chronograph of the second seconds with arrow-shaped arrow Minerva stands out from the hands of hours and minutes of rhodium finish. Turning the black ceramic bezel with knurled edge, you can detect a second time. Waterproof up to 100 meters, the 43mm stainless steel case with satin finish also evokes the spirit of motor racing with its semi-skeleton axes inspired by the aerodynamic lines of classic bodywork. The rubber strap has asymmetrical holes as those of the racing gloves and a relief pattern that allows optimal transpiration and allows maximum wrist adherence. The new specially developed triple release buckle offers flexibility and maximum comfort to the wrist. To ensure maximum reliability and best performance, the timepiece was subjected to rigorous Montblanc Laboratory Test 500 tests.

ReturnPolicy.Description:
RETURN POLICY :

We will gladly issue a refund credit / change object for the value of the merchandise returned within 14 days from the day that you received your item(s).
Items must be returned in the same condition as received (i.e. Unworn, unused).
Item value over 2000$ must be returned in franchigia as export return
You will need to carefully save and send us back all the original tags, packaging and paperwork from the item.
customers have to communicate by mail the return BEFORE to send back the object, we will send instructions for safety return (IST). 
Don t ship back anything before to receive our instructions  
Please ensure you send the parcel using any traceable method, the items are your responsibility until they arrive at our returns department.
To the returned item/s please add the documents as our IST - (do not modify documents for any reason without our authorization; this operation could have cost and we will deduct the amount from your refund)
Please allow us up to 7 days from the day we received your item to handle your request
